about_the_game:
The Store page is being Revamped...eventually.

"An open-ended, SCP-inspired, atmospheric, exploration-focused, survival-horror game with puzzle elements and replayability."

What happened to the sun?

What happens when the day breaks?

Exposure to the light renders us free

You can’t hide down there forever.

Contact with affected individuals is inevitable and wonderful

Let us in Let us in Let us in

Survivors of the Daybreak event think they know better

They will never be free from the light.

At this point, there is no escape. We will come together.

--------------------------------

You're trapped, cut off from the rest of the world, can you get out, or will you save everyone?

SCP:Daybreak takes place in 1993, you play as Alex Burman, assigned to Site-52 during the start of the When Day Breaks Event, also known as Daybreak.

You must solve puzzles, hide from the sun and it's Instances, and dig deeper to find the truth as to why this facility exists.

Multiple Endings.

Many Choices, or none at all.

Leave it all or Save then All, your Decision.

content_descriptors.notes: THis Product includes Extreme Violence and Gore.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Microsoft Windows 10 x64
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Unknown
  • VR Support: No VR Support.
  • Additional Notes: Rough Minimum Specs, Read Reccomended.
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Microsoft Windows 10/11 x64
  • Processor: Intel Core i7 or equivalent
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1650 / RTX 2060 SUPER or higher.
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 12 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Unknown
  • VR Support: No VR Support.
  • Additional Notes: Average CPU and GPU are listed, lower systems may run this game.
